text: Denise N. George also known as Denise George-Counts is a U.S. Virgin Islands lawyer and former television news reporter serving as the Attorney General. She completed a B.A. in radio, television, and film at the University of Maryland, College Park. George completed a J.D. from Howard University School of Law in 1984. == References == Category:20th-century American lawyers Category:21st-century American lawyers Category:African-American lawyers Category:African-American television hosts Category:African-American women lawyers Category:American television news anchors Category:American women television presenters Category:Howard University School of Law alumni Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:United States Virgin Islands lawyers Category:University of Maryland, College Park alumni Category:20th-century American women lawyers Category:1959 births Category:21st-century American women lawyers
title: Denise George
